entity.name: composition_of_individual_product
entity.description:
A composition_of_individual_product is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship that is a
Composition of individual product (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a product_as_individual that is the whole.

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a product_as_individual that is the part.
